case.state: Poker huh? I think I've heard of it, I'm game if you are, ~player~!
You invited me here, ~player~? Well, I guess I'll stay if you're playing.
You're challenging me? Hah, you don't know what you're getting into.
Hmm... Blake, about that bow...
So, you say your from the plains of Sacae? Never heard of them.
So you're Rinkah? I guess I can kinda see why people call you "best girl."
So. Coco was it? Hmph.
Someone is awfully stylish...
Wait, so you're saying you guys don't know what drivers or blades are?
Wait, Sakuya, where is your core crystal?
So D.Va, you're a streamer right? You don't stream stuff like this do you?
Hold on, Tojiko, you're saying you're NOT a blade?
So, you guys travel around as a team? Isn't it a little strange to be here together?
You know, I don't think I'd be comfortable being here with my party members.
Let's see... Give me ~cards~ cards.
Let's do this! I'll take ~cards~ cards.
Here we go. Uhh, I'll take ~cards~ cards.
You think Adam would come to a place like this?
So, uh, come here often? I bet some of you do...
[Foresight is saying ~cards~ cards.] Heh, I'll take ~cards~ cards.
[Foresight guide me...] Hmm, ~cards~ cards sounds good.
Let's see... I know, give me ~cards~ cards.
Give me ~cards~ so we can this over with.
~cards~ cards. No, I'm not pouting.
Uhhh ~cards~ cards? [How are people still focusing on the game!?]
Haha! I won't be losing anything this round!
Behold the power of an Aegis! What are you looking at? That's not a weird thing to say!
Maybe I'm not doomed after all.
Just as I planned.
[Thanks Foresight] Luck of the draw I guess!
Sorry ~player~, my dress isn't going anywhere this round.
Yes! You're not seeing anything more this round!
Haha! Someone else is losing this round!
Aaaand, safe!
Haha, bet this'll shut you up!
I suppose these cards could be worse...
O-okay, I think I should be fine.
Ugh, this hand is as lame as a common blade.
This better be good enough...
Well, there should be someone with worse cards...
I-If I lose I have to... In front of ~player~...
I feel like this game has gone on long enough? Right?
I deserve a better hand than this, especially now...
Please let this be enough...
Well. It could be worse.
Would you mind if I just stopped here? ... Yeah that's what I thought.
I've foreseen what happens if I lose this hand, and I'd rather not.
This is awful! I deserve better cards than this!
Who dealt these cards!? Kasandra?
~player~! You better not be giving me bad cards on purpose!
This could be a problem.
This isn't what I saw at all...
W-what!? But my Foresight...
Oh no.
Are you kidding me?
Did you set this up ~player~!?
B-but that means... [Wait, hold on...]
I gotta find a way out of this... [Maybe...]
Wow. Really? Not even gonna try to hide the fact that you're cheating, Amalia?
If you're going to cheat, at try to be subtle about it, Amalia.
Fine. Go ahead and cheat, Amalia. You'll still lose regardless.
So you're princess Corrin? Hmm,,,
Nice weapon you got there Lyn, sometime I gotta show you mine.
Wait, is that a camera!? Why is that allowed here!?
Pyrrha huh? You know, you really remind me of my sister.
Sure. You keep on believing that, Tharja.
Yeah, that's not gonna happen, Zone.
Keep dreaming, Zone.
So Miko, is that you're blade back there?
Wow, Miko, you're a driver? I didn't expect to meet anyone like that here.
Look ~player~, that Remilia girl appears to be a driver!
Wow! Hey! I didn't think I'd run into any blades here!
So you both hail from the same world, not to make assumptions but are you royalty? The ones I meet here all seem to be.
It's just my clothing and I like it, Nami. Adam said it looked good on me.
Thanks Rarity. I guess that makes me feel a little bit better about this situation.
I'm glad you think so, Rarity. It's still a shame some of it will be coming off.
I am the legendary Aegis, feather boy. I'm sure most people have seen me at one point or another.
I suppose I can't win EVERY round.
I guess it's my turn, oh well, at least I still have a lead.
I lost? How did that happen?
W-well, I suppose If everyone else is already...
So, uh, I guess you did notice...
Eheh, so you saw through that, did ya?
Why are we playing this game again!?
W-well, if everyone is... Maybe it won't be... Mmm...
Ugh, AGAIN? What is with this game?
What!? If I find this game was rigged there will be hell to pay.
Stupid game, anyways...
Why are we even playing this game!?
~player~...
Ugh. Oh well, game is still early.
Aww, come on! I shoulda had that.
Hmm. I'm not used to losing.
Ugh, I suppose the game is fairly even now.
Hmm. This could be bad, I only have so many accessories.
What? I lost again? Ugh, wipe that smirk off your face ~player~!
I want to die.
So, uh, I guess you did notice...
Eheh, so you saw through that, did ya?
Why did I agree to this again?
How am I ever going to live this down...
You should be ashamed, making ME do this.
How could I be losing to you lot?
This could be going better.
You were hoping this would happen, weren't you, ~player~!?
That look in your eyes is irritating...
Oh no... Not again...
B-but, ~player~!!!
So, uh, I guess you did notice...
Eheh, so you saw through that did ya?
So now I-I have to? In front of everyone!?
When this is over, you all better forget what you've seen here today!
I have a weapon. That you can be sure of, Nami.
I would miss them and you can bet that I would notice, Nami.
They are. (I don't like that look in Nami's eyes.)
What are you going on about, feather boy? I've never seen you in my life.
Spirit? I have no idea what you're talking about, feather boy.
As a matter of fact, I did, Rarity.
Sorry Rarity, but I am the designer.
Lost one huh? This is no big deal.
You guys still don't stand a chance.
This one is a little hard to remove on my own.
Guess it's a good thing that I wore this today.
Sooo, can each shoe count as an item? ... Yeah, that's what I thought.
Ugh, I don't know if I'm liking this game anymore.
Ugh, this isn't looking good.
Man, I liked these gloves, I always thought they looked classy.
Oooh, how did we get here...
I-I guess rules are rules.
I catch you looking and I'll step on you.
I never thought it would happen like this...
How did you convince me into coming here again?
J-just pretend that you're at the hot springs...
I didn't think this is how you'd get me naked, ~player~.
You know there were easier ways this could have went down, ~player~.
I'll remember that you made me do this in front of other people, ~player~.
As much as I would love to leave, I don't think it'd be a good idea to leave my Driver in a room with you.
If I see pictures from today anywhere, I WILL find you Mahiru.
I think you've got the wrong person, feathers.
And why exactly were you just fumbling with your camera, Mahiru?
Ugh, actually you'd probably enjoy that wouldn't you? Perverts.
Fine! I'll take my tiara off too? How about that?
Tell you what, to give you a shot, I'll take my tiara off too.
Why are you looking at me like that? Wait. Did you...
You thought that was hot!? Excuse me?
Hmm... I'm starting to run out of accessories...
I guess it's a trade off, I suppose it's easier to move, but I could do without the extra attention.
I'm all out of accessories, time to get serious. Maybe they won't notice if I...
What? My core crystal? No, it was not a part of my dress, okay?
Ugh, I'm standing here like this, and you? You should at least complement me.
Yeah, yeah, pick your jaw up off the floor, ~player~!
I know this is something you've never seen before, but look somewhere else!
I hope you take responsibility for seeing me like this, ~player~!
So, what do you think?
I-I might forgive you if you complement me properly...
Oooh, It's ~player~'s turn?
Yes! Rules are rules, ~player~!
Oh? It's ~player~'s turn to strip? Guess I was wrong to assume you were good at this when you invited me.
I hope you're not losing on purpose...

state.text: You'd better make it worth my while ~player~, since you've got me like this.
Come on ~player~, give me something to look at.

case.state: What are you going to take off, ~player~?
N-no, I have NOT thought about this before...
Ooh, I want to see what you've got, ~player~!
Help me out here, ~player~!
Ooh, yes! ~player~!
C'mon ~player~, make this worth my while!
After what just happened, I bet you're aching to lose now, ~player~.
Is this your way of taking responsibility, ~player~?
A hot-blooded muscle head without a shirt on?
So, are you actual royalty, ~name~? Or are you just delusional like Dagas?
Oh? Just ~name~? Why don't you take one for the team, ~name~?
Step your game up, ~name~.
~name~ huh? At least I didn't lose.
You better not be turned on by this, ~name~!
Anyone else's loss is a victory at this point.
Give me something to look at, ~name~!
Bet you're going to enjoy stripping while looking at this.
Are you just trying to take your clothes off at this point?
Taking something off NOW doesn't help as much ~name~.
N-no, I didn't want you to lose anymore rounds...
You going to take off that bow now?
It's just like the time I played with Vale.
Come on ~name~, is that all you've got?
Yeah ~name~! Take it off!
A win is a win, even if it's you losing.
~player~? Well it's nothing I haven't seen before.
C'mon ~player~, we can't BOTH lose here.
You planning on joining me, ~player~?
Hah, this is what you get, ~player~!
Let's see how much you like it, ~player~!
Well isn't someone stylish...
It's Corrin's turn? Shame, I kinda liked your whole warrior princess look.
I gotta say, kinda curious to seeing what you look like without it.
Y-you guys are even making royalty...
Assuming your sword is first to go? No worries, you still got that swords-woman look going for you.
Wow Lyn, you've got almost as many extras as I do.
Is Lyn going to have to lose that fancy dress...
They certainly seem close enough to be a driver pair.
How did this happen to us Corrin? We should be above this...
W-we should be above this Corrin.
So you're supposed to be a goddess, Palutena? I'm not impressed.
You're a goddes, Palutena? Could've fooled me.
What's wrong goddess? All out of accessories?
So you're a model Ami? Bet you're not used to being second best...
You've definitely got the whole water theme going for you, Misty.
Hmm. You've got the same kind of presence the Brighid does, Palutena.
So, you're a healer, L'Arachel?
Sorry, Rarity. I like your outfit if that makes you feel any better.
That's a shame. I really like your outfit, Rarity.
Ice motif, ponytail, regal presence...
So, are you actual royalty, ~name~? Or are you just weird like Sheba?
This is just like the time I played with Vale.
Hey ~name~, maybe you should lose more often.
I'm not quite sure where to look.
I'm just glad it's not me.
Ugh, be better at this so we can take the guys out.
I guess a win is a win, even if it's just you losing.
Good. Take some of the attention off of me!
Just ~name~? No reason for me to stop.
C'mon, stop losing, ~name~. This isn't helping.
Oh, ~name~. Let's move this along.
Payback.
I should introduce you to Zeke, Kamina.
Is that all? Show some balls! W-wait, that came out wrong.
I'm sure you can do better than that...
W-why are you looking at me like that? This is exactly what I was expecting.
Ugh, try to keep this interesting will you?
Are you kidding me? Be a man, ~name~!
Is that all!?
How is that supposed to help?
Am I a joke to you?
I'm sure you two bozos would get along.
Let's move this along, shall we?
I hope you can keep this game interesting.
This isn't the last thing you are going to lose...
One step closer...
I'm going to remember this, ~name~.
Be more grateful considering what you are looking at.
Die.
I'll burn you.
Ungrateful scum.
You really should be more excited about this...
Even Pyra thinks you're being a wimp.
Well fine then...
So what's the deal with the glasses? Just trying to act all mysterious?
You just don't have that "divine presence" that I was expecting.
You're just much more plain than what I would expect from a goddess.
What is that?
What did you just drop?
Of course, you're not on fire, but I'm talking about the whole regal kind of feeling.
Does that mean that the orb on the top of your staff is a Bit-Ball?
Oh yeah! You really remind me of Perun, Weiss.
I think you would like Perun, Weiss. You two have a lot in common.
Ooh, smart, just your ~clothing~.
What did you expect when playing against me?
Alright, keep playing it safe, we'll whittle you down eventually.
What!? You still have your ~clothing~!?
I saw that ~name~! You won't be smiling long...
~Clothing~!?! This is ridiculous!
WHAT?
I should have Siren blast you to pieces.
Now you are just being mean.
~Clothing~!? This late in the game?
Seriously? ~name~ MUST be cheating!
Aha! I knew you were Gormotti! Why exactly did you hide it though?
Oh, what? And here I was worried about you!
A blade!?
Huh. Not what I was expecting.
Gold? Pshh. Big deal. Did you not see all my accessories made of emeralds, miss goddess?
IS gold really the most precious material a goddess has access to?
A-a pirate? (Is it really safe to be here right now?)
Pirate?! (~Player~! Maybe we should leave!)
Though, something about you seems much less elegant.
Let's get going!
Still a step closer to my victory!
Hope you're ready to lose again.
It's time to get serious.
I feel robbed.
I'll get you for this.
When this is over, I'm going to find you and you WON'T like what happens next.
You should know that I have a LONG memory.
Wow ~name~. Just, wow,
Bitch.
Oho... Things are starting to get a little interesting, ~name~...
I suppose that's better than nothing.
That's another one down for ~name~.
Taking off your ~clothing~, ~name~? Looks like someone is starting to get desperate.
How do you still have ~clothing~!?
I'm like this and you!?
You good to keep going, ~name~?
You might as well quit now.
That's a good look on you, ~name~.
You're the worst.
How are you not more excited!?
Don't you want to impress me?
I suppose it's better than nothing.
I thought guys would be excited to take their clothes off...
Ugh! Someone needs to teach you some manners.
Karma is gonna get you some day.
I hope you're not enjoying this, ~player~.
I bet SOMEONE is happy about this.
Be more confident, ~name~.
~Clothing~!? This late in the game?
Come on, show some skin will ya?
You can do better than that, ~name~!
Ugh, SERIOUSLY, ~name~!?
You know, people who get on my bad side don't have a great life expectancy.
If it were not for the rules of this place, I would end you on the spot.
~player~, how can you stand for this injustice!?
You good to keep going, ~name~?
You might as well quit now.
That's a good look on you, ~name~.
You're not me, but you can still afford to be confident.
You're dead to me.
And here I was thinking that we could have been friends.
You can at least TRY to be cool.
You're the worst.
Worst. Vacation. Ever.
Next time, we go somewhere I pick, ~player~.
W-what? ~name~, you're taking off your ~clothing~!?
Ugh, I bet your enjoying this aren't you!
What do you think you're doing, ~name~!
That's what you get.
Starting to get into this a little...
Hey, it's only fair.
Haha! Let's keep going!
This is getting interesting...
Bet you've always wanted to take off your ~clothing~ in front of me huh?
Taking off your ~clothing~? Things are heating up...
~Clothing~? Someone wants to hurry and lose.
It's not like I wanted to see you take off you ~clothing~.
How did we get here...
You don't have much left now do you...
I-I am NOT enjoying this.
Not bad.
I think you have what it takes to be a driver.
Just a little more...
You could afford to show a little more don't ya think?
Thanks for the meal,
Mmmm...
Hmph, not bad.
And your personality kind of reminds me of Praxis...
~name~? Can't you try and get ~player~ out?
*Gasp* ~name~, you're taking off your ~clothing~?
Look away from her, ~player~!
Oh no... What if I have to do that... I-is this why ~player~ invited me?
Yeah! Time for a comeback!
At this point, I'll take the win.
Yeah, yeah, move it along, ~name~.
Gonna be kinda underwhelming now, don't you think?
Would you just lose already?
That reminds me of the swimsuit I got recently. Meybe I should go swimming sometime soon.
Hmmm, maybe I could introduce the two of you to each other.
S-so we can leave! Yeah, that's why.
This is starting to get real...
How bold...
Not bad I guess, but everyone here is still looking at me.
Is that all you've got?
I don't suppose you could take off more?
You'll join me soon enough.
Next.
Hurry it up will you!?
No, I'm not pouting...
Does that mean we are about to see...
Time for you to show us what you got, ~name~.
I guess you knew what you were signing up for...
Show us what you got!
Yes! Payback time!
This'll help...
Finally something to look at!
About time.
N-no, I'm not excited.
Now there's a chest I don't mind focusing on...
I-I'm wasn't staring.
(Did he notice... Nah, its ~name~.)
Hmm, you're definitely an Adam. In a good way.
Hope you're learning your lesson, ~name~.
Looks better than I expected, ~name~.
[When exactly did I start enjoying this?]
Not bad ~name~, not bad at all.
Yeah, I'm going to be focusing on that chest for awhile...
Maybe you should bring that a little closer...
That'll do nicely...
What are you doing after this, ~name~?
~name~! What do you think you're doing!?
S-stop! ~name~, why do you think we want to see that!?
~player~, this has gone too far, I think we should leave. NOW.
[Okay, okay, deep breaths...]
I think I'm ready...
Moment of truth...
So, it's finally time...
Please... Yes...
Show it to me, ~name~...
I'm curious as to how hard I've made you...
Hmmm...
It's not like I WANT to see your...
I-I've never had much of a problem with size...
It's like that cause of me. No question.
Size matters not...
Aww, it's fun-sized!
Almost makes this worth it.
Pretty obvious as to why it's like that...
Just what I expected...
Kinda hard to see, I think I need a better look.
As expected, the answer is VERY.
You better not be enjoying this ~name~!
Oh, um, wow... I've never, um, wow...
It better not be like that because of me!
It's like that cause of me. No question.
You've been looking at me too much...
I-its pointed right at me...
Pretty obvious as to why it's like that...
Seems like you've been having a good time ~name~!
Be honest, you've been waiting to show me that for a long time, ~name~.
You look like you want to give me a hand, ~name~.
Someone's been enjoying the show...
You better not be enjoying this ~name~!
Hmmm...
It's like that cause of me. No question.
Wow, I didn't realize that they came in that size...
Nope. Was not not ready for THAT.

state.text: Pretty obvious as to why it's like that...

case.state: [We'll never know if it fits until we try...]
You, uh, didn't tell me you already had your own blade.
[I don't know if it will fit...]
Be honest, you've been waiting to show me that for a long time, ~name~.
They're not all that big, are they?
Maybe this'll shut her up.
I feel like you're about to regret bringing that camera...
Just the top of the swimsuit? Is that even allowed?
S-see? This is why we shouldn't allow cameras!
Just pretend we're at a hot spring...
Is it that time already?
Let's see how you measure up!
Heh. I'm not at all worried.
Take your best shot, ~name~.
Something tells me this isn't going to have much of an impact.
You've already lost your audience, ~name~.
This should be easy, ~name~. No one is watching YOU.
I doubt you'll get the reaction you're hoping for, ~name~.
Heh. Your turn, ~name~.
I'm sure you'll catch up in time...
Hmm, I think you and Nia would get along.
Hey, some men like it like that, ~name~.
Hah.
Nice try, ~name~.
Hmph. Are all models such show-offs?
Ugh. Stop enjoying this.
Oh. You're not wearing anything underneath. Yeah, I guess we can allow it.
~player~! What are you looking at!
Wipe that look off your face, ~player~!
Looks like someone's popular...
Not bad ~name~, but not great.
At least you'll draw SOME attention.
Look at all those slack jaws, maybe there is some power to being a model...
Is that all?
Maybe someday, ~name~.
Not bad, but not impressive.
Soon, you'll be right here with me.
Someone is confident.
Can we wrap this up?
Oh, how bold...
Looks like I have competition...
~player~! What are you looking at!
Showoff...
[Audible pouting]
Or not...
... I hate her.
Bet you they are fake.
I catch you staring at ~name~ again, and you're dead, ~player~.
~name~ has to... Oh boy...
Why exactly did you invite ~name~, ~player~!?
Never thought that something like this would feel like a victory.
Haha! I've still got a shot to win this!
Finally you're catching up, ~name~.
Lets see...
Let's see how you like it.
That's... a lot of hair.
Do you...do anything to take care of that? At all?
Well, that's a look...
Oh god, why am I here!?
Least I'm not the only one...
I saw that, ~player~...
Justice is served.
Yeah. Still a little awkward.
~player~! What was that look?
Hey, would you stop comparing us!?
Yeah, this is a strange day.
You seem used to the attention.
I'm not sure why, ~name~, but you really remind me of this other Blade I know named Floren.
Is that supposed to be a weapon? It's seem rather small to be honest.
I feel like you would get along well with Vale, ~name~.
Green hair? That reminds me, I wonder if Pneuma would any good at this.
A gun? Pfft. Compared to Ether Cannons that Herald and Azami use, that thing's practically a toy.
You don't show much emotion, do you ~name~? You're a lot like Theory I guess.
You're so innocent and cute, ~name~! You remind me a lot of Ursula in fact.
That mask isn't going to make you go on a murderous rampage or anything, is it ~name~?
Your mask isn't cursed or something like that, is it ~name~? I've already been through enough of that with Kasandra.
Do military people enjoy games like this? Maybe I should bring Morag and Newt along next time.
I sometimes wear my hair in a ponytail, too. Though, my hair is usually also green whenever I do.
I guess you don't talk very much, ~name~. Though, if I've learned anything from Wulfric, that's not necessarily a bad thing.
A robot? I guess that's nothing new, though I doubt you're as impressive as Poppi.
You seem like a pretty smart person, ~name~. You even remind me of Adenine a little.
You're a "superhero", ~name~? I'm suddenly reminded of Godfrey.
Poppi wears her hair in twintails when she's in her second form. Well, it's not actually hair, but that's what it looks like.
You've got some really long hair, ~name~. You could probably go for Dahlia's hairstyle if you wanted to.
I'm cheering you on, ~name~.
Feel free to look over here!
You didn't lose on purpose, did you!?
Whaa? Already!?
Well, this is going to be interesting...
I-I guess you can look at me, a little.
Join me, ~name~...
I can tell from your face that we both have been waiting for this.
S-so now ~name~ has to rub one out?
I'll get you for that Pyra...
Actually, I take that back, look away!
I better not catch you looking at me while you...
Ugh,,, Pervert.
Oh my, he's really...
Okay, turns out, not mentally prepared for this.
You seem raring to go for some reason.
You must have been holding back the urge for awhile now.
That look in your eyes... This is so not a punishment for you.
Yes... Praise me some more...
Ugh, stop looking at me, ~name~!
How... Impressive, being able to... In front of...
Oh wow, suddenly it seems really hot in here...
I catch you looking at me again, and you die.
W-why would you think we want to see this, ~name~!? I-idiot...
[Try not to look, try not to look...]
O-okay, I'll permit you to look at me this time.
I bet you've been waiting for this all match.
B-be grateful you get to look at me like this while you...
My eyes are up here, ~name~!
Stop fantasizing ,~name~!
Get that smile off your face, ~name~!
Wow, you certainly have a lot of energy ~name~.
Look me in the eyes, ~name~...
~name~, tell me how amazing I am,,,
Show me your everything, ~name~.
We should try and time this right, ~name~...
~name~...
Would it help if I started again?
Are there rules against helping?
I'm still a little sensitive, maybe next time...
Looks like I'm your favorite.
Hope you're enjoying yourself, ~name~...
You should be grateful you get such a sight.
If you're gonna keep staring, you should praise me some more.
W-wow, I definitely wasn't ready for that...
If any of that got on my dress, the game isn't the only thing you would have lost.
Pervert!
Talk about a shining arrow...
I-I did NOT enjoy that ~name~! Idiot!
Feels like such a waste for you to be over there...
Oh, ~name~! You were a little early...
Mmm, I think you got some over here...
You want to go another round, ~name~?
Feels like a waste, don't you think, ~name~?
W-wow, looks like you had a good time, ~name~.
Maybe someone should grab that camera from you now. For safekeeping I mean.
A-at least this means no one will take pictures for a bit...
Hah. Nice try.
You lost? Already?
So now she has to...
Game's over now right? Right? ...
Oh boy, poor ~name~.
This is NOT what the game was like when we played with Vale ~player~!
Oh, you're joining me?
Hope you're ready for this, ~name~.
Looks like you're up, ~name~...
Oh god, what if I have to do that... Can't afford to lose here.
Is ~name~ really...
C'mon, you might enjoy it more than you'd think.
The more the merrier I guess.
Eyes off ~player~, ~name~!
Hope you learned your lesson.
Is even this a competition to you, Ami?
Can you try not being so loud, ~name~!?
That's not distracting at all, ~name~...
Stop looking at ~name~, ~player~!
How are we just supposed to keep playing while ~name~ is...
Impressive technique, ~name~.
You seem like your really good at this, ~name~.
How exactly did we end up like this, ~name~?
A-are you having fun, ~name~?
Hope you learned something today, ~name~.
Oh good, you're done...
W-wow, how, climactic...
I guess this means I'm winning, but it sooo doesn't feel like a victory.
I-I wasn't looking, my face is just red cause of the heat.
